scripts.dev:full: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "npm run emulators:backend"
scripts.build: npm run build:functions && npm run docs:generate && npm run build:frontend
scripts.emulators:backend: npm run build:functions && firebase emulators:start --only auth,firestore,functions
scripts.docs: npm run build:functions && npm run swagger --workspace=functions && echo 'API docs generated! Open docs/index.html in your browser to view the Swagger UI.'
scripts.docs:generate: npm run swagger --workspace=functions && shx mkdir -p frontend/public/api && shx cp docs/openapi.json frontend/public/api/openapi.json
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:functions && npm run docs && npm run build:frontend && firebase hosting:channel:deploy staging --expires 7d
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:functions && npm run docs && npm run build:frontend && firebase deploy
scripts.lint: eslint . && npm run type-check --workspace=frontend && npm run type-check --workspace=functions
scripts.test: npm run test:functions && npm run test:frontend
